Title: Ganbare Chibi Godzilla
Description: ["A video promotion for Chiharu Sakazaki's ", Ganbare Chibi Godzilla, ' (Do Your Best, Chibi Godzilla) picture book. Chibi Godzilla introduces himself as "big and strong" but also describes his crybaby tendencies. The video ends with Chibi Godzilla producing a fiery display that pleases his friends. ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: ANN)']
